titleStmt.title: The meeting of gallants at an ordinarie: or The walkes in Powles
titleStmt.author: Middleton, Thomas, d. 1627, attributed name.
Dekker, Thomas, ca. 1572-1632, attributed name.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by T. C[reede] and are to be solde by Mathew Lawe, dwelling in Paules Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: Variously attributed to Thomas Dekker and Thomas Middleton.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
